#summary Stuff that we need

= Gearman =

Start gearman workers with the following command:

{{{
$ nohup php jakob-worker.php &
}}}

== Installation ==
See http://www.gearman.org and http://toys.lerdorf.com/archives/51-Playing-with-Gearman.html

{{{
$ apt-get install gearman gearman-job-server gearman-tools libgearman4 libgearman-dev libdrizzle-dev
}}}
